snippet: The Beer Authority opens in Midtown; Pok Pok NY, from the Portland, Ore., chef Andy Ricker, arrives in Brooklyn; and Ribalta, a pizzeria, opens in the East Village.
abstract: Restaurants Almayass, Baobq, Beer Authority, Foragers City Table, Boukies, Mole, Pok Pok NY, Rafele, Ribalta and Vic and Anthony's Steakhouse open in New York.
lead_paragraph: The Beer Authority opens in Midtown; Pok Pok NY, from the Portland, Ore., chef Andy Ricker, arrives in Brooklyn; and Ribalta, a pizzeria, opens in the East Village.

headline.seo: Restaurant Openings in New York — Off the Menu
